content: close to me cowl a tippy tree yarns pattern pattern notes available in two sizes this cowl is meant to be snug and warm for those biting cold days a quick and easy knit with a very easy 2 row pattern repeat will have you making one of these for everyone in your home made with super bulky wool it is sure to keep you warm and is designed to easily cover your cheeks and ears when needed i ve even folded mine double and used as a headband/ear warmer abbreviations bobble bind off bor beginning of round co- cast on k knit p purl pm- place marker sl1- slip 1 stitch purl wise with yarn in back sm- slip marker close to me cowl tippy tree yarns cowl 2 sizes snug less snug blue sample= snug olive sample= less snug needle - us 13 9 0mm 16- 22 circular or 13 dpns yarn- 1 skein tippy tree yarns super bulky 100g/76 yards sw 80/20merino/nylon blue jean baby snug /olive less snug gauge 10 5 sts and 17 row to 4 in stockinette in the round/unblocked* *note- i find blocking unnecessary for this pattern/block lightly if wanted* pattern set up co 51 57 stitches using long tail co join in the round careful not to twist stitches place marker for bor round 1 * k8 10 p2 sl1 p2 sl1 p2 sl1 * repeat from * to bor round 2 *k8 10 p2 k1 p2 k1 p2 k1 *repeat from * to bor snug size- repeat 2 round pattern a total of 15 times bobble in pattern less snug size repeat 2 round pattern a total of 14 times bobble in pattern weave in your ends & go face the cold boldly close to me cowl tippy tree yarns
